name: Zerg Rush
description:
Survive. Evolve. Overcome.

During a Terran invasion, you and your brother hatch from your egg. When pursued by a couple of marines you are separated from your brother, but the only thing you can do is run. Survive enemy encounters, evolve your abilities, and overcome the obstacles standing in your way.

Zerg Rush is a runner inspired by the characters and lore of Starcraft. It is reminiscent of games on Kongregate and fits in the "5 minute" category.  It is the first title released by LoneZ and was made in a week for a local game jam with the theme "zerg rush".  This version presents the original gameplay showcased at the game jam with a few quality of life updates.

Programmer: Z

Pixel Artist: Mantis

Audio: Free assets provided through the Unity asset store.

Disclaimer: This is a fanmade work based on Blizzard Entertainment's Starcraft. We have no affiliation with Blizzard Entertainment.
